item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello there, this is the blog of Adrian Martinez, a CS student at ETH Zurich. Here you will find posts about various topics. I hope you enjoy your stay :D

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: This is my very first post on this blog. Obligatory code: public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("Hello, World!"); } I hope you enjoy your stay on this blog, and I will see you again very soon.
